4 #include <math.h>

8 class STATISTIC
9 {
10 public:
11 
12  STATISTIC();
13  STATISTIC(double val, int count);
14 
15  void Add(double val);
16  void Clear();
17  int GetCount() const;
18  void Initialise(double val, int count);
19  double GetTotal() const;
20  double GetMean() const;
21  double GetVariance() const;
22  double GetStdDev() const;
23  double GetStdErr() const;
24  double GetMax() const;
25  double GetMin() const;
26  void Print(const std::string& name, std::ostream& ostr) const;

29 
30  int Count;
31  double Mean;
32  double Variance;
33  double Min, Max;
34 };
35 
36 inline STATISTIC::STATISTIC()
37 {
38  Clear();
39 }
40 
41 inline STATISTIC::STATISTIC(double val, int count)
42 {
43  Initialise(val, count);
44 }
45 
46 inline void STATISTIC::Add(double val)
47 {
48  double meanOld = Mean;
49  int countOld = Count;
50  ++Count;
51  assert(Count > 0); // overflow
52  Mean += (val - Mean) / Count;
53  Variance = (countOld * (Variance + meanOld * meanOld)
54  + val * val) / Count - Mean * Mean;
55  if (val > Max)
56  Max = val;
57  if (val < Min)
58  Min = val;
59 }
60 
61 inline void STATISTIC::Clear()
62 {
63  Count = 0;
64  Mean = 0;
65  Variance = 0;
66  Min = +INFINITY;//+Infinity;
67  Max = -INFINITY;//-Infinity;
68 }
69 
70 inline int STATISTIC::GetCount() const
71 {
72  return Count;
73 }
74 
75 inline void STATISTIC::Initialise(double val, int count)
76 {
77  Count = count;
78  Mean = val;
79 }
80 
81 inline double STATISTIC::GetTotal() const
82 {
83  return Mean * Count;
84 }
85 
86 inline double STATISTIC::GetMean() const
87 {
88  return Mean;
89 }
90 
91 inline double STATISTIC::GetStdDev() const
92 {
93  return sqrt(Variance);
94 }
95 
96 inline double STATISTIC::GetStdErr() const
97 {
98  return sqrt(Variance / Count);
99 }
100 
101 inline double STATISTIC::GetMax() const
102 {
103  return Max;
104 }
105 
106 inline double STATISTIC::GetMin() const
107 {
108  return Min;
109 }
110 
111 inline void STATISTIC::Print(const std::string& name, std::ostream& ostr) const
112 {
113  ostr << name << ": " << Mean << " [" << Min << ", " << Max << "]" << std::endl;
114 }
